name: Side Swap
description:
Each level has the bright side and the dark side, which you can swap between. At the end of each level, you will get a different ending, depending on which side you spent more time in. Which side will you pick? There are 4 quite hard levels. I implemented open game, where you have all levels unlocked from the beginning.

Music:
https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/
Kevin MacLeod - Blippy Trance
Kevin MacLeod - Voxel Revolution
